required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of AZD1981 in Patients With Moderate to Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
clinical_study.official_title: A 4 Week Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Randomized, Parallel Group Phase IIa Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of AZD1981 in Patients With Moderate to Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to study efficacy and safety of AZD1981 in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Mean change in FEV1 from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
Mean change in Total CCQ from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing). Scores for total CCQ range from 0 (low symptoms) to 6 (high symptoms).

secondary_outcome.description: Mean change in FVC from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
Mean change in SVC from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
Mean change in IC from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
Mean change in FEF25%-75% (forced expiratory flow between 25% and 75% of the FVC) from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)

Mean change in COPD symptom sleep score from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient). Scores for COPD symptom sleep score range from 0 (no symptoms) to 4 (no sleep).

Mean change in COPD symptom breathing score from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient). Scores for COPD symptom breathing score range from 0 (none) to 4 (severe).

Mean change in COPD symptom cough score from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient). Scores for COPD symptom cough score range from 0 (none) to 4 (almost constant).

Mean change in COPD symptom sputum score from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient). Scores for COPD symptom sputum score range from 0 (none) to 4 (severe).
Mean change in PEF morning from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient).
Mean change in PEF evening from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient).
Mean change in Total use of reliever from baseline to treatment period average (calculated using all available data after randomisation for each patient).
The number of participants that experienced at least one adverse event.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- FEV1 between 30 and 80% of predicted normal value post-bronchodilator (GOLD stages 2 and 3)
- Clinical diagnosis of COPD
Exclusion Criteria:
- Other clinically relevant disease or disorders
- Exacerbation of COPD within 30 days

overall_official.affiliation: Professor in Respiratory Medicine, Hvidovre, Denmark

participant_flow.recruitment_details: 118 patients were allocated to treatment and 111 completed the study. First patient entered the study on 26 May 2008 and the last patient finished the study on 17 December 2008.

baseline.population: One patient randomised to placebo withdrew consent immediately after the first dose of investigational product on the day of randomisation. No clinical measurements were performed and no reports of AEs were received for this patient. Since the patient is non-informative both in terms of efficacy and safety, he has been excluded from the analyses.

outcome.title: FEV1
outcome.description: Mean change in FEV1 from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
outcome.population: The efficacy analysis is based on 117 randomized patients, 61 on AZD1981 and 56 on placebo. However, not all patients will have valid, non-missing values for a given outcome measure.

measure.title: FEV1
measure.description: Mean change in FEV1 from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing)
measure.population: The efficacy analysis is based on 117 randomized patients, 61 on AZD1981 and 56 on placebo. However, not all patients will have valid, non-missing values for a given outcome measure.

outcome.title: Clinical COPD Questionnaire
outcome.description: Mean change in Total CCQ from baseline to Week 4 (last measurement post dose used, if data missing). Scores for total CCQ range from 0 (low symptoms) to 6 (high symptoms).
outcome.population: The efficacy analysis is based on 117 randomized patients, 61 on AZD1981 and 56 on placebo. However, not all patients will have valid, non-missing values for a given outcome measure.

outcome.title: Adverse Event
outcome.description: The number of participants that experienced at least one adverse event.
outcome.population: The safety analysis is based on 117 randomized patients, 61 on AZD1981 and 56 on placebo.

measure.title: Adverse Event

measure.population: The safety analysis is based on 117 randomized patients, 61 on AZD1981 and 56 on placebo.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
